HOME.TITLE: Santa Claus Shop Registration
HOME.HEADER: A Toy for Every Girl and Boy
HOME.MESSAGE:
Welcome to the Denver Santa Claus Shop Pre-registration where we plan on fulfilling our mission even during the pandemic! This toy give-away program is available to Denver residents on Dec. 11, 12, 14, & 15.

Please follow the prompts to pre-register so that the distribution process can go quickly and save you time the day of the event. This year will be a mobile drive through toy distribution. You will receive toys based on your child’s age and gender.

If this is your first visit to the preregistration page, select "Create Account" and follow the instructions.

If you have already created an account and are visiting to change an existing registration, you will need to select "Sign In" and follow those instructions. Any change or addition will delete the first entry, so be sure to re-enter all information.

We look forward to providing your family with some Holiday cheer during these trying times.

SIGNIN.MAKE_ACCOUNT1: If you haven't created an account with us yet you can make one
SIGNIN.DEVICE_ISSUE_MSG: Please try again using a different browser or device. We apologize for the inconvenience

SIGNUP_ACCOUNT.LEGAL_AGREEMENT: By signing up you agree to our terms of service and have read our privacy policy
SIGNUP_ACCOUNT.NOW_SIGN_IN: Now sign into the account you just created
SIGNUP_ACCOUNT.CONFIRM_EMAIL_MSG: It cannot be changed after this step. After registration, we send your ticket to this email address.
SIGNUP_ACCOUNT.VERIFICATION_FAILED_MSG: You need to refresh the page to try again

FORGOTPASS.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your email address below and click the "Send Reset Email" button

REGISTRATION.CODE_HELP: If your code doesn't show up here don't worry! Just check your email and print it from there or try coming back in a few minutes
REGISTRATION.CHANGE_DETAILS: Need to change your registration details?
REGISTRATION.GATES_OPEN: Gates will open at 9am each day to begin line formation
REGISTRATION.BRING_ID: Bring your ID and children's birth certificates (or other form of id)
REGISTRATION.PRINT_PAGE: Print or save this page or the email we sent you!
REGISTRATION.YOUR_TICKET: This is your ticket to the event
REGISTRATION.ENTRY_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter parking lot of Monaco at light All other entrances will be blocked off to DSCS traffic
REGISTRATION.LETTER_LASTNAME_0: Please use the first letter of your last name to choose your date
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_1: Press the blue "Add Child" button to start adding your children
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_2: We only have toys for children ages 11 and under
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_3: After you add a child you can edit them by clicking on them
REGISTRATION.UPDATE_REGISTRATION_REMINDER: Don't forget to update your registration if you add or change children!
REGISTRATION.MAKE_SURE_DATETIME: Be sure you picked your arrival date and time
REGISTRATION.DOUBLE_CHECK_CHILDREN: Double-Check that all of your children (ages 11 and under) are added
REGISTRATION.CHECK_WEBSITE: Please check our website prior to your date for any weather or covid updates
REGISTRATION.PROCEED_1: Are you finished adding your children?
REGISTRATION.PROCEED_2: Click "Go Back" if your are not done
REGISTRATION.PROCEED_3: If you're finished adding your children click "Register" to finish registering
REGISTRATION.MODIFY_2: Press the blue "Update Registration" at the bottom once you're done to save your changes
REGISTRATION.MISSING_1_MSG: We're going to bring you back one step.
REGISTRATION.MISSING_2_MSG: You need to choose your arrival date and time
REGISTRATION.UPDATED_MSG_1: You will get a new email, check your spam folder
REGISTRATION.UPDATED_MSG_2: If you updated your children your old ticket is no longer valid. Remember to print the new email.
REGISTRATION.REGISTERED_3: Save or print the email we sent you. You will need it on the day of the event to check in.
REGISTRATION.QR_INFO: If your QR Code isn't loading try refreshing the page. Also check your email.

ADDCHILD.INSTRUCTIONS: Add your child below and save
ADDCHILD.INFANT_MSG: We have pre-packaged, gender neutral toys for children ages 0-2!
ADDCHILD.TOO_OLD_2: We only have toys for children ages 11 and under

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy for Denver Santa Claus Shop
PRIVACY.1: Your privacy is important to us. It is denversantaclausshop.org's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://denversantaclausshop.org, and other sites we own and operate.
PRIVACY.2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
PRIVACY.3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
PRIVACY.4: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
PRIVACY.5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
PRIVACY.6: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
PRIVACY.7: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.
PRIVACY.8: Cookie Policy for Denver Santa Claus Shop
PRIVACY.9: This is the Cookie Policy for Denver Santa Claus Shop, accessible from https://register.denversantaclausshop.org
PRIVACY.11: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of the sites functionality.
PRIVACY.12: For more general information on cookies see the Wikipedia article on HTTP Cookies.
PRIVACY.14: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.
PRIVACY.16: You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). You can also opt out of our cookies by using the button at the bottom of this page. Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certainfunctionality and features of the this site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.
PRIVACY.19: If you create an account with us then we will use cookies for the management of the signup process and general administration. These cookies will usually be deleted when you log out however in some cases they may remain afterwards to remember your site preferences when logged out.
PRIVACY.21: We use cookies when you are logged in so that we can remember this fact. This prevents you from having to log in every single time you visit a new page. These cookies are typically removed or cleared when you log out to ensure that you can only access restricted features and areas when logged in.
PRIVACY.22_1: In order to provide you with a great experience on this site we provide the functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. In order to remember your preferences we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page is affected by your preferences.
PRIVACY.24: In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site.
PRIVACY.25: This site uses Google Analytics which is one of the most widespread and trusted analytics solution on the web for helping us to understand how you use the site and ways that we can improve your experience. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site and the pages that you visit so we can continue to produce engaging content.
PRIVACY.26: For more information on Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.
PRIVACY.27: From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.
PRIVACY.29: However if you are still looking for more information then you can contact us through one of our preferred contact methods:
PRIVACY.31: This policy is effective as of November 30, 2020.
